sen.e: Her mature performance in the film "Sandakan Hachiban-shokan Bokyo" (literally, "Homesickness at No.8 House of Prostitutes in Sandakan") directed by Kei KUMAI in 1974 was so highly appreciated in the world that she received Ginkuma-sho (a prize of Silver Bear for the best actress) at the Berlin International Film Festival and Geijutsu Sensho Monbu-daijin-sho (a prize of Minister of Education for the Selected and Recommended Art.)
